Title: Anarchy in Royston Vasey
Plot: Pauline leaves her hostage with Mikey to go in search fo food. Geoff and Brian bury Mike alive, and Tubbs and Edward catch a no-tail. Lee finds that Creme Brulee has reformed without him.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
